Fügt deiner Gilde eine Aktivitätsrolle hinzu.
If not provided, the bot will look for r: Wenn nicht gegeben, wird der Bot Rollen mit dem gleichen Namen suchen oder eine neue erstellen
If false, the activity name 'Chrome' wou: Wenn falsch, wird für die Aktivität 'Chrome' auch die Rolle für 'Google Chrome' vergeben
Should the bot remove the role again whe: Soll der Bot die Rolle wieder entfernen, wenn die Aktivität beendet ist?
Deletes an activity role from your guild: Löscht eine Aktivitätsrolle. Gib die Aktivität, die Rolle oder beides an.
the activity roles with this name will b: the activity roles with this name will be deleted
the activity roles of this role will be: the activity roles of this role will be deleted
Exports all game roles in your guild as: Exports all game roles in your guild as a JSON file.
sets the language for the guild: setzt die Sprache für die Gilde
Listet alle Aktivitätsrollen in deiner Gilde auf.
The bot currently serves **%s** and mana: The bot currently serves **%s** and manages **%s** for **%s**.
A Discord bot for automatic role assignm: A Discord bot for automatic role assignment based on activities.
If you add an activity role with `/addac: If you add an activity role with `/addactivityrole`, the bot will start looking for activities with the specified name. If a user starts an activity with that name, the bot will add the role to the user.
If `exact_activity_name` is set to false: If `exact_activity_name` is set to false, the activity name `Chrome` would also trigger for `Google Chrome`.
If it is true, the activity must match e: If it is true, the activity must match exactly and case-sensitively.
If you set `live` to true, the bot will: If you set `live` to true, the bot will remove the role from users who got the role from the bot and don't have the activity anymore.
**The bot will not remove any roles that: **Der Bot wird keine Rollen entfernen, die manuell hinzugefügt wurden.**
%s\nIf I forgot you, please let me know!:
%s
If I forgot you, please let me know!
You need to provide a role or an activit:
You need to provide a role or an activity. If you provide a role, all activity roles for that role will be deleted. If you provide an activity, all activity roles with that name will be deleted.
If you provide both, all activity roles with that name for that role will be deleted.
If you want to help translating the bot,: If you want to help translating the bot, you can do so at %s. Thanks!
You can only set the guild language in a: You can only set the guild language in a guild!
The language is already set to **`%s`**.
There are no activity roles in this guil: There are no activity roles in this guild.
The bot is currently **%s** for this use:
The bot is currently **%s** for this user.

You can change this with the command `/toggleAutoRole`.
Automatic role assignment for your user: Automatic role assignment for your user is now **%s**.
You can change this with the command `/t: You can change this with the command `/toggleAutoRole`.
The guild language will be used.
Require users to have this role in order: Require users to have this role in order to receive Activity Roles.
The role to require. To get the current: The role to require. To get the current role, omit this. To reset, enter @everyone.
Users need to have %s in order to receiv: Users need to have %s in order to receive Activity Roles.
%s is already set as the required role.
Users now need to have %s in order to re: Users now need to have %s in order to receive Activity Roles.

Overwrites the guild language: legt die Sprache des Benutzers fest. Überschreibt die Gildensprache.

sets the language for the user. Overwrit: sets the language for the user. Overwrites the guild language.
Shows a list of activities in this guild: Shows a list of activities in this guild.
Show role IDs (can’t be imported in anot: Show role IDs (can’t be imported in another guild)
the event the user must have to receive: the event the user must have to receive the role
the role to assign. To remove the role,: the role to assign. To remove the role, omit this option
